mapper.sql: id, code, name, sex, national_id, province, city, birthday, education_name, political_name, school_date, mobile, extra_department_name, job_name, comment, photo
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, s.name as national_name, t.province, t.city, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.school_date, t.mobile, t.extra_department_name, t.job_name, t.comment, t.photo FROM people_total t LEFT JOIN dict_national s ON s.id = t.national_id
t.id = #{id}

delete from people_total where id in
#{item}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into people_total ( code, name, sex, national_id, province, city, birthday, education_name, political_name, school_date, mobile, extra_department_name, job_name, comment, photo, status ) values ( #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{nationalId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday, jdbcType=DATE}, #{educationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicalName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extraDepartmentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 9 )

mapper.update:
update people_total
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
national_id = #{nationalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province = #{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday, jdbcType=DATE},
education_name = #{educationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
